ygData.subject: Re: Shining Star of Light
ygData.msgSnippet: Well you can have all of the above. I will take the Bull Smasher any day of the week. Panor 14th Circle of Brell Bertox ... From: Mr. J Daniels
ygData.messageBody:
Well you can have all of the above. I will take the Bull Smasher any day of
the week.

Panor
14th Circle of Brell
Bertox


----- Original Message -----
From: Mr. J Daniels <warpig@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 21, 1999 1:34 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Shining Star of Light


> From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>
> Just my opinion but I do not like the ssol. I'd much rather use the
> staff of observers over SSOL. I use an enamalled black mace now which is
> better than both IMO. (If you have a guardian shield to accompany it.)
>
> On Tue, 21 Sep 1999, Jeff Habermann wrote:
>
> > I keep reading that everyone on here loves to use there SSOL. I would
like to get this weapon as well. I am a human cleric from the Temple of
Marr in Freeport. Will i have problems trying to do the quest, or will i be
ok? Just want to make sure, before I make that loooong journy from freeport
to qeynos. Thanks
> >
> >
>
>
>
